1:
Clap your hands, all you peoples;\q shout to God with the sound of triumph.
\q
2:
For Yahweh Most High is terrifying;\q he is a great King over all the earth.


\q
3:
He subdues peoples under us\q and nations under our feet.
\q
4:
He chooses our inheritance for us,\q the glory of Jacob whom he loved.
\qs Selah\qs*
\q
5:
God has gone up with a shout,\q Yahweh with the sound of a trumpet.


\q
6:
Sing praises to God, sing praises;\q sing praises to our King, sing praises.
\q
7:
For God is the King over all the earth;\q sing praises with understanding.


\q
8:
God reigns over the nations;\q God sits on his holy throne.
\q
